Kittler Construction

About Kittler Construction

Kittler Construction Incorporated (KCI) grew out of K & K Farm Service and was incorporated at a separate entity in 2002 to separate the grain bin and land leveling portions of the business from the seed business. You can read more on their about page.

About The Project

Mission: This company builds grain bins and sells other farming equipment. Their previous website was very very old. They needed a new design and a portfolio directory to show off their off.

Technologies Used: Laravel, Tailwind CSS
